price: Je! makafiri wamelipwa malipo ya yale waliyo kuwa wakiyatenda?
arabic: هَلۡ ثُوِّبَ ٱلۡكُفَّارُ مَا كَانُواْ يَفۡعَلُونَ
footnotes: Je! Makafiri watalipwa huko Akhera kwa waliyo yatenda duniani?

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: hal thuwwiba al-kufāru mā kānū yafʿalūna
